mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JOBPOST ( id, active, url, company_name, title, opening_date, expiration_date, location, job_code, job_code_name, experience_level, experience_level_name ) VALUES(#{id},#{active},#{url},#{companyName},#{title},#{openingDate}, #{expirationDate},#{location},#{jobCode},#{jobCodeName}, #{experienceLevel},#{experienceLevelName})
